definition: to cover up (a shortcoming)/to screen off/to hide/to conceal

sentences.english: The strengthening of Ji'nan awning construction site for electricity.
sentences.chinese: 加强济南遮阳蓬施工现场的用电办理。

sentences.english: Which company Guangxi jade forest has can installation outside sunshade shed?
sentences.chinese: 广西玉林有哪些公司可以安装室外遮阳棚？

sentences.english: My mind's eye, peeping through the window, backs off, fluttering under the awning.
sentences.chinese: 我的灵目透过窗缝偷窥，退后，翩跹于遮阳棚下。

sentences.english: In direct sunlight they act as protective sunshades.
sentences.chinese: 在阳光直射下，他们充当保护遮阳篷。

sentences.english: Under the hot sun, the student in the middle resorts to a light-colored wig to block the sun.
sentences.chinese: 烈日当空，走在中间的学生，索性带顶浅色假发遮阳。

sentences.english: She stayed under the sunshade when others were swimming in the sea.
sentences.chinese: 别人在大海里游泳，而她呆在遮阳伞下面。

sentences.english: I live in places like caves and hollow trees. I also might hang under the awnings of buildings.
sentences.chinese: 我住在山洞和树洞中，也可能挂在建筑物的遮阳棚下。

sentences.english: Why hadn't she brought something to eat?
sentences.chinese: 她怎么没有把遮阳帽带来呢？

sentences.english: Visibly, the side door awning is stretching towards my customer's house.
sentences.chinese: 很明显可见，侧门遮阳篷铁支是伸向我的客户的房子。

sentences.english: Shopkeepers are dropping their awnings and getting out their bicycles.
sentences.chinese: 一个店老板拉下遮阳篷，推出自行车。

sentences.english: The awning extends several feet over the sidewalk.
sentences.chinese: 这个遮阳蓬盖住了人行道上好几英尺的地方。

sentences.english: Wear a hat or sunglasses when you are in the sun.
sentences.chinese: 阳光猛烈时，外出请戴上遮阳帽或太阳镜。

sentences.english: A large tension spring which is unfolded in the curved arm.
sentences.chinese: 曲臂内有将遮阳篷展开的大拉力弹簧。

sentences.english: If you can't find a shady spot to sit, put up an umbrella .
sentences.chinese: 推车有遮阳蓬，如果不能找到树阴，就带把遮阳伞。

sentences.english: If you can't find a shady spot to sit, put up an umbrella .
sentences.chinese: 推车有遮阳蓬，如果不能找到树阴，就带把遮阳伞。

sentences.english: Wear your sunglasses and sunhat before you go to the beach.
sentences.chinese: 去海滩时戴上墨镜和遮阳帽。

definition: to flow freely (of air)/to ventilate/to breathe (of fabric etc)/to take a breath of fresh air/to divulge
to wear a hat/(fig.) to stigmatize/to be branded as
to protect from wind/fangfeng (Saposhnikovia divaricata), its root used in TCM
to give shelter from the wind and rain/to keep out the elements
